text: I'm sorry to report that the latest post on Khloe Kardashian's Khloe With a K app is all about looking ` ` thin AF'' in photos. HEAVY SIGH. As the ` ` fat'' sister in my family, I love Khloe on a very deep level, and it's always a bit of a bummer to see her being just as image obsessed as her siblings. I mean, she can't really escape the, uh, culture of her family — remember when they told her to lose weight because she was hurting their brand?! — but I just wish she would fight back against it more.
